## Ingredients

Chicken or pork 

Make the marinade 

4 capfulls (4 tbs) soy sauce 
1 tbs curry paste (Panang) 
2 heaping tbs brown sugar 
4 tbs coconut cream/milk 

## Instructions

Fry the curry paste in oil then add the other marinade ingredients. 

Reserve enough to brush on during grilling then add more water/coconut cream to turn it into enough marinade. 

Marinade the meats (thinly sliced into strips) for at least an hour 

Grill until delicious brushing on the reserved sauce.
